trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract base class from which all dynamic update notifications of changes to <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>s must be derived.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma classe base abstrata da qual todas as notificações de atualização dinâmica de alterações para <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref>s deve ser derivado.

trans-unit.source: This class can be used by a tracking service to determine that <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>s have been dynamically updated.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe pode ser usada por um serviço de acompanhamento para determinar que <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>s foram atualizadas dinamicamente.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>

trans-unit.source: The derived classes indicate which <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> is being dynamically updated, and what operation is being performed (added to the workflow, removed from the workflow, or changed).
trans-unit.target: As classes derivadas indicam qual <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>está sendo atualizada dinamicamente, e qual operação está sendo executada (adicionado ao fluxo de trabalho, o fluxo de trabalho removido ou alterado).</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionChangeAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionChangeAction"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to be changed.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém o nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> a ser alterado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to be changed.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> a ser alterado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionChangeAction"></xref> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, verifica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionChangeAction"> </xref> está configurado corretamente e não tem erros.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> changes are occurring in.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> que o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> alterações estão ocorrendo no.
A coleção de erros de validação.
